item.title: MongoDB Performance Tuning Book Notes
item.description: if the write concern is set to “majority”, then the database will not complete the write operation until a majority of secondaries receive the write. We can also set the write concern to wait until all secondaries or a specific number of secondaries receive the write operation. Oplog →The primary node stores information about document changes in a collection within its local database called the Oplog. The primary will continuously attempt to apply these changes to secondary instances.
